name: OneeChan Emoji =Pony Expansion Pack= ^-^/)
description:
For those of you who want poni emoji without the big mean Seaweed taking them away! 

Just install like you do, and they should show up next to your name when you post. 
All you have to do is put your preference anywhere in the email field: 
"pinkie" 
"applejack" 
"fluttershy" 
"twilight" 
"rainbow"
"rarity" 
"spike"
"applebloom"
"macintosh"
"bonbon"
"braeburn"
"celestia"
"cheerilee"
"colgate"
"derpy"
"whooves"
"fancypants"
"fleur"
"fluttershy"
"luna"
"octavia"
"rose"
"scootaloo"
"sweetie"
"trixie"
"vinyl"
"zecora"
additional_info: -Added orphaned pony emoji from other broken/dated scripts, namely this one -> [Linky] -Added Pony Emoji (Seaweed dropped these in OneeChan)
